messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] in relation to the last kantei
messages.msgSnippet: Very nice, Rich. ... From: Richard Turner To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, March 06, 2006 11:33 PM Subject: [nihontostudy] in relation to the
messages.messageBody:
Very nice, Rich.
----- Original Message -----
From: Richard Turner
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2006 11:33 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] in relation to the last kantei


I received this today. It was sold as late Muromachi Owari. I have
tabled it Kanayama ( I can't stop doing that it seems LOL )

A rich black/purple patina, a small guard at 65mm x 65mm x 5mm, lots of
irregular bones around the mimi.

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/kanayama-sukashi.html

Theme appears to be Ginger leaves and ???????????

Also, just for interest, this arrived also. I think this is early Teimei
by the mei i.e. first, maybe second. Can any confirm or deny ?.

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/kishu_ju_teimei_2.html

cheers

Rich

--

Richard Turner
Nihont么 Message Board
<http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/nmb>
- /for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihont么/
